INTERSHOP IOM 4.8.0-SNAPSHOT Database Model   (revision f2aa1e74ea2213350aa0d42ef578eca809632abb)

Table oms.Role2RightDO

List of rights assigned to the different roles. This mapping can be performed in OMT.

Columns 

References[1] Column Type Constraints[2] Default Comment
id bigint PK, UNIQUE, NOT_NULL nextval('"Role2RightDO_id_seq"')  
RightDefDO rightDefRef integer NOT_NULL  
RoleDO roleRef bigint NOT_NULL  

[1] Not all references are enforced by a foreign key where they could.
Such "missing" foreign keys are denoted with [[ ]].

[2] Constraints:
PK : the column is part of the primary key
UNIQUE: does don't cover unique constraints and indexes defined on more than one column.

Constraints and Indexes 

Type Name Definition
PRIMARY KEY Role2RightDO_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id) 
UNIQUE CONSTRAINT Role2RightDO_rightDefRef_key UNIQUE ("rightDefRef", "roleRef") 
FOREIGN KEY Role2RightDO_fk_roleRef FOREIGN KEY ("roleRef") REFERENCES "RoleDO"(id) 
FOREIGN KEY rightDefRefRole2RightDO FOREIGN KEY ("rightDefRef") REFERENCES "RightDefDO"(id) 
INDEX index_Role2RightDO_rightDefRef CREATE INDEX "index_Role2RightDO_rightDefRef" ON "Role2RightDO" USING btree ("rightDefRef") 
INDEX index_Role2RightDO_roleRef CREATE INDEX "index_Role2RightDO_roleRef" ON "Role2RightDO" USING btree ("roleRef")
